snippet.title: You Can't See Ghosts! Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You Can't See Ghosts is a puzzle game where you aid ghosts in reaching the exit, but there's a twist, you can't see any of them! Use context clues like the sounds they make when bumping into walls or stepping on glass. These cues help you determine their exact position as you solve various puzzles.

Try out the Demo for free now on:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3165640/You_Cant_See_Ghosts
Itch.io - https://simplypassiongames.itch.io/you-cant-see-ghosts
